rightsInfo.usageTerms: the Creative Commons Attribution (CC BY) 4.0 license applies to all NewsCodes

contentMeta.description: Vocabulary of statistics for American Football

concept.name: yards-per-attempt
concept.definition: The average yards gained per play.

concept.name: number-of-plays
concept.definition: The number of plays this team has completed, including for offensive, defensive, and special teams.

concept.name: number-of-plays-gaining
concept.definition: The number of plays this team has completed for which yards were gained, including for offensive, defensive, and special teams.

concept.name: number-of-plays-losing
concept.definition: The number of plays this team has completed for which yards were lost, including for offensive, defensive, and special teams.

concept.name: average-starting-position
concept.definition: Average yard-line that the team started on per-drive.

concept.name: timeouts
concept.definition: The number of timeouts a team has remaining, either in regulation or in overtime, whichever state the game is currently in.

concept.name: turnover-ratio
concept.definition: Derived by subtracting turnovers-giveaways from turnovers-takeaways.

concept.name: offensive-plays-yards
concept.definition: The total yards accumulated through offensive plays.

concept.name: offensive-plays-number
concept.definition: The number of offensive plays.

concept.name: offensive-plays-average-yards-per
concept.definition: The average number of yards gained per play.

concept.name: offensive-plays-average-yards-per-game
concept.definition: The average number of yards gained via offensive plays per game.

concept.name: offensive-rank
concept.definition: How team's offense compares with rest of league or conference.

concept.name: possession-duration
concept.definition: The average amount of time the team had possession per-drive.

concept.name: possessions-inside-20
concept.definition: Number of times team has driven inside its opponent's 20 yard line.

concept.name: turnovers-giveaway
concept.definition: Derived by adding passes-interceptions plus fumbles-own-lost.

concept.name: turnovers-giveaway-average
concept.definition: Average-per-game for turnovers-giveaway.

concept.name: handoffs-total
concept.definition: Usually, number of times QB has handed off, typically leading to a running play.

concept.name: pitches-total
concept.definition: Usually, number of times QB has pitched back to another player, typically leading to a running play.

concept.name: tackles-offense
concept.definition: The number of tackles performed while on offense.

concept.name: tackles-assists-offense
concept.definition: The number of tackle assists performed while on offense.

concept.name: passes-attempts
concept.definition: The number of passes attempted.

concept.name: passes-completions
concept.definition: The number of passes completed successfully.

concept.name: passes-completions-average-per-game
concept.definition: Average number of completed passes a game.

concept.name: passes-percentage
concept.definition: The percentage of all passes that are completed successfully.

concept.name: passes-yards-gross
concept.definition: The number of yards gained from passing.

concept.name: passes-yards-net
concept.definition: Subtracts out the sacks-against-yards-lost value of stats-american-football-sacks-against element.

concept.name: passes-yards-lost
concept.definition: Amount of yards lost due to sacks and completed passing plays that ended behind the line of scrimmage.

concept.name: passes-yards-per-attempt
concept.definition: Gross passing yards divided by number of pass attempts.

concept.name: passes-first-down
concept.definition: Number of passes a player or team has made for a first-down.

concept.name: passes-touchdowns-percentage
concept.definition: The ratio of touchdown passes to attempted passes.

concept.name: passes-interceptions
concept.definition: The number of passes that were intercepted.

concept.name: passes-interceptions-percentage
concept.definition: The ratio of intercepted passes to attempted passes.

concept.name: passes-interceptions-yards
concept.definition: Opponent's yards gained after interceptions.

concept.name: passes-interceptions-average
concept.definition: Average number of interceptions per game.

concept.name: passes-interceptions-longest
concept.definition: Longest interception return against a passer.

concept.name: passes-interceptions-touchdown
concept.definition: Number of opponents' touchdowns scored from passer's interceptions.

concept.name: passes-longest
concept.definition: The yards gained by the single longest completion.

concept.name: passes-average-yards-per
concept.definition: Gross passing yards divided by number of pass completions.

concept.name: passes-average-yards-per-game
concept.definition: Total yards passing divided by number of games played.

concept.name: passer-rating
concept.definition: A complex formula designed to measure quarterback performance.

concept.name: receptions-total
concept.definition: The total number of successful passes.

concept.name: receptions-average-per-game
concept.definition: Average number of receptions per game.

concept.name: receptions-yards
concept.definition: Number of yards a receiver is credited for.

concept.name: receptions-first-down
concept.definition: Number of receptions a player has taken for a first-down.

concept.name: receptions-longest
concept.definition: The longest reception a player had, including to the point where they scored, were-tackled, etc.

concept.name: receptions-looks
concept.definition: The number of opportunities this receiver had to receive the ball.

concept.name: receptions-average-yards
concept.definition: Average yards per game from receptions.

concept.name: receptions-average-yards-per
concept.definition: The average yards per reception.

concept.name: passing-rank
concept.definition: How a player or team's passing stats ranks in a league or conference, usually using total passing yards as the measure.

concept.name: times-thrown-total
concept.definition: Number of passes directed at receiver, including incompletions, interceptions, etc.

concept.name: receptions-career-100-yard-games
concept.definition: Number of times in receiver's career where total receiving yardage per game exceeded 100.

concept.name: passing-career-300-yard-games
concept.definition: Number of times in passer's career where total passing yardage per game exceeded 300.

concept.name: rushes-attempts
concept.definition: The number of attempted rushes.

concept.name: rushes-yards
concept.definition: The number of yards gained by rushing.

concept.name: rushes-yards-left
concept.definition: The number of yards gained by rushing up the left side of the field.

concept.name: rushes-yards-middle
concept.definition: The number of yards gained by rushing up the middle of the field.

concept.name: rushes-yards-right
concept.definition: The number of yards gained by rushing up the right side of the field.

concept.name: rushing-average-yards-per
concept.definition: The average number of yards per rush.

concept.name: rushes-first-down
concept.definition: The number of rushes that have resulted in a first-down.

concept.name: rushes-longest
concept.definition: The number of yards gained by the single longest rushing play.

concept.name: rushes-average-attempts-per-game
concept.definition: Average number of rushing attempts per game.

concept.name: rushes-average-yards-per-game
concept.definition: Average number of yards gaining from rushes a game.

concept.name: rushing-rank
concept.definition: How a player or team's rushing stats ranks in a league or conference, usually using total rushing yards as the measure.

concept.name: rushes-career-100-yard-games
concept.definition: Number of times in rusher's career where total rushing yardage per game exceeded 100.

concept.name: first-downs-total
concept.definition: The number of first downs achieved.

concept.name: first-downs-pass
concept.definition: The number of first downs achieved from passing.

concept.name: first-downs-run
concept.definition: The number of first downs achieved from rushing.

concept.name: first-downs-penalty
concept.definition: The number of first downs achieved from penalties on the other team.

concept.name: first-downs-yards
concept.definition: Number of yards gained on first down plays.

concept.name: first-downs-average-yards-per
concept.definition: Number of average yards gained on first down plays.

concept.name: conversions-second-down
concept.definition: The number of first downs achieved on a second down.

concept.name: conversions-second-down-attempts
concept.definition: The number of second downs.

concept.name: conversions-second-down-percentage
concept.definition: The percentage of first down attempts on a second down that were successful.

concept.name: conversions-third-down
concept.definition: The number of first downs achieved on a third down.

concept.name: conversions-third-down-attempts
concept.definition: The number of third downs.

concept.name: conversions-third-down-percentage
concept.definition: The percentage of first down attempts on a third down that were successful.

concept.name: conversions-fourth-down
concept.definition: The number of first downs achieved on a fourth down.

concept.name: conversions-fourth-down-attempts
concept.definition: The number of fourth downs.

concept.name: conversions-fourth-down-percentage
concept.definition: The percentage of first down attempts on a fourth down that were successful.

concept.name: sacks-against-yards
concept.definition: Total number of yards lost by the offense from sacks.

concept.name: sacks-against-total
concept.definition: Total number of times that the offense was sacked.

concept.name: sacks-against-average
concept.definition: Average number of times per game a quarterback is sacked.

concept.name: sacks-against-safeties
concept.definition: Number of sacks that resulted in safeties.

concept.name: tackles-total
concept.definition: The number of tackles made by the defense. Commonly the sum of tackles-solo and tackles-assists.

concept.name: tackles-solo
concept.definition: The number of tackles made where only one member of the defense commited the tackle.

concept.name: tackles-assists
concept.definition: The number of tackles made where multiple members of the defense commited the tackle.

concept.name: tackles-team
concept.definition: The number of tackles made which were credited to the team as a whole.

concept.name: quarterback-hurries
concept.definition: An unofficial stat given when a defensive player pressures and hurries the quarterback into making a throw to avoid being sacked.

concept.name: passes-defensed
concept.definition: Total number of times a pass was deflected or otherwise defended against, causing a pass to be incomplete.

concept.name: turnovers-takeaway
concept.definition: Derived by adding interceptions-total plus fumbles-opposing-recovered.

concept.name: yards-allowed-total
concept.definition: Total yardage a defense allowed, usually through passing and rushing.

concept.name: yards-allowed-average
concept.definition: Total yardage a defense allows per game.

concept.name: defensive-plays-number
concept.definition: Number of plays a defense is on the field.

concept.name: inside-20-plays
concept.definition: Number of plays inside defensive team's 20 yard line.

concept.name: inside-20-points-against
concept.definition: Number of points given up when opponents' possession starts inside defensive team's 20 yard line.

concept.name: inside-20-touchdowns-against
concept.definition: Number of touchdowns given up when opponents' possession starts inside defensive team's 20 yard line.

concept.name: inside-20-touchdowns-against-percentage
concept.definition: Ratio of touchdowns allowed to possessions when opponents' possession starts inside defensive team's 20 yard line.

concept.name: defense-rank
concept.definition: How a team's defensive stats rank in a league or conference, usually using yards allowed per game as the measure.

concept.name: defense-rank-pass
concept.definition: How a team's passing defense stats rank in a league or conference, usually using passing yards allowed per game as the measure.

concept.name: defense-rank-rush
concept.definition: How a team's rushing defense stats rank in a league or conference, usually using rushing yards allowed per game as the measure.

concept.name: interceptions-total
concept.definition: The number of passes the defense has intercepted.

concept.name: interceptions-yards
concept.definition: The number of yards gained as a result of an interception.

concept.name: interceptions-average
concept.definition: The average number of yards gained from interceptions.

concept.name: interceptions-percentage
concept.definition: Percentage of passes intercepted.

concept.name: interceptions-longest
concept.definition: The longest interception returned. Greatest number of yards gained on an interception.

concept.name: interceptions-touchdown
concept.definition: Number of interceptions that were run back for a touchdown.

concept.name: sacks-total
concept.definition: The number of sacks made by the defense.

concept.name: sacks-yards
concept.definition: Number of yards gained by the defense.

concept.name: sacks-team
concept.definition: The number of sacks credited to the team as a whole.

concept.name: sacks-yards-team
concept.definition: Number of yards gained by the defense on sacks credited to the team as a whole.

concept.name: touchdowns-total
concept.definition: The number of touchdowns scored by the offense.

concept.name: touchdowns-passing
concept.definition: The number of touchdowns scored by passing.

concept.name: touchdowns-rushing
concept.definition: The number of touchdowns scored by rushing.

concept.name: touchdowns-special-teams
concept.definition: The number of touchdowns scored by special teams.

concept.name: touchdowns-defensive
concept.definition: The number of touchdowns scored by the defense.

concept.name: touchdowns-receptions
concept.definition: The number of receptions resulting in a touchdown.

concept.name: extra-points-attempts
concept.definition: The number of extra points attempted by the offense.

concept.name: extra-points-made
concept.definition: The number of extra points made.

concept.name: extra-points-missed
concept.definition: The number of extra points missed.

concept.name: extra-points-blocked
concept.definition: The number of extra point attempts that were blocked.

concept.name: extra-points-percentage
concept.definition: Ratio of extra points completed to attempts.

concept.name: field-goal-attempts
concept.definition: The number of field goals attempted.

concept.name: field-goals-made
concept.definition: The number of field goals made.

concept.name: field-goals-missed
concept.definition: The number of field goals missed.

concept.name: field-goals-blocked
concept.definition: The number of field goal attempts that were blocked.

concept.name: field-goal-longest
concept.definition: Yardage of longest successful field goal attempt.

concept.name: field-goals-percentage
concept.definition: Ratio of field goals made to attempts.

concept.name: field-goals-average
concept.definition: Average number of field goals made per game.

concept.name: safeties-against
concept.definition: The number of safeties scored against the offense.

concept.name: two-point-conversions-attempts
concept.definition: The number of two point conversions attempted.

concept.name: two-point-conversions-made
concept.definition: The number of successful two point conversions.

concept.name: two-point-conversions-made-rushing
concept.definition: Number of successful two-point conversions from running plays.

concept.name: two-point-conversions-made-passing
concept.definition: Number of successful two-point conversions from passing plays.

concept.name: touchbacks
concept.definition: For Canadian Football. Used to record the number of touchbacks that resulted in scores.

concept.name: single-points
concept.definition: Number of points earned from the single, a CFL-specific scoring play where a kicking team prevents its opponent from returning a kickoff, punt or missed field goal from outside the opponent's own end zone.

concept.name: inside-20-points
concept.definition: Points earned by offensive team when possession starts inside opponent's 20 yard line.

concept.name: inside-20-touchdowns
concept.definition: Touchdowns scored by offensive team when possession starts inside opponent's 20 yard line.

concept.name: inside-20-touchdowns-percentage
concept.definition: Ratio of touchdowns to possessions when possession starts inside opponent's 20 yard line.

concept.name: returns-punt-total
concept.definition: The number of punts returned.

concept.name: returns-punt-yards
concept.definition: The number of yards gained from punt returns.

concept.name: returns-punt-average
concept.definition: The average number of yards gained on each punt return.

concept.name: returns-punt-longest
concept.definition: The number of yards gained on the longest punt return.

concept.name: returns-punt-touchdown
concept.definition: The number of punts returned for a touchdown.

concept.name: returns-punt-against-total
concept.definition: Total number of punt returns defended.

concept.name: returns-punt-against-yards
concept.definition: Total number of yards allowed from punt returns.

concept.name: returns-punt-against-average
concept.definition: Average number of yards allowed from punt returns.

concept.name: returns-punt-against-longest
concept.definition: Yardage of longest punt return allowed.

concept.name: returns-punt-against-touchdown
concept.definition: Number of touchdowns from punt returns allowed.

concept.name: kickoffs-total
concept.definition: Total number of kickoffs to opposition.

concept.name: kickoffs-adjusted
concept.definition: Number of kickoffs excluding onside kicks or kickoffs at the end of a half unless either kickoff is returned for a touchdown.

concept.name: kickoffs-to-inside-20
concept.definition: Number of kickoffs resulting in opponent's possession starting inside own 20 yard line.

concept.name: kickoffs-drive-start-against-average
concept.definition: Average starting position of opponent's possession after a kickoff.

concept.name: onside-kicks-attempted
concept.definition: Number of onside kicks attempted.

concept.name: onside-kicks-recovered
concept.definition: Number of onside kicks recovered by kicking team.

concept.name: returns-kickoff-total
concept.definition: The number of kickoffs returned.

concept.name: returns-kickoff-yards
concept.definition: The number of yards gained from kickoff returns.

concept.name: returns-kickoff-average
concept.definition: The average number of yards gained on each kickoff return.

concept.name: returns-kickoff-longest
concept.definition: The number of yards gained on the longest kickoff return.

concept.name: returns-kickoff-touchdown
concept.definition: The number of kickoffs returned for a touchdown.

concept.name: returns-kickoff-adjusted
concept.definition: Number kickoffs adjusted for onside and end-of-half (non-touchdown) kickoffs.

concept.name: returns-kickoff-inside-20
concept.definition: Number of kickoff returns that failed to advance past the returning team's 20 yard line.

concept.name: returns-kickoff-drive-start-average
concept.definition: Average start position after kickoff returns.

concept.name: returns-kickoff-against-total
concept.definition: Total number of kickoff returns.

concept.name: returns-kickoff-against-yards
concept.definition: Yards allowed from kickoff returns.

concept.name: returns-kickoff-against-average
concept.definition: Average yards allowed per kickoff return.

concept.name: returns-kickoff-against-longest
concept.definition: Yardage of longest kickoff return allowed.

concept.name: returns-kickoff-against-touchdown
concept.definition: Touchdowns allowed from kickoff returns.

concept.name: returns-total
concept.definition: The total number of returns. Punts + kickoffs.

concept.name: returns-yards
concept.definition: The total number of yards gained on punts and kickoffs combined.

concept.name: punts-total
concept.definition: The number of punts.

concept.name: punts-yards-gross
concept.definition: The sum of the distances of all punts.

concept.name: punts-yards-net
concept.definition: The sum of the distances of all punts, minus the distances they were returned.

concept.name: punts-longest
concept.definition: The distance of the longest punt.

concept.name: punts-inside-20
concept.definition: The number of punts inside the 20 yard line.

concept.name: punts-inside-20-percentage
concept.definition: The percentage of punts inside the 20 yard line.

concept.name: punts-average
concept.definition: The average gross punting yardage.

concept.name: punts-average-net
concept.definition: Average net yards - punt length minus return - per punt.

concept.name: punts-against-total
concept.definition: Number of punts forced by defensive team.

concept.name: punts-against-yards-gross
concept.definition: Number of yards of opposing team's punts.

concept.name: punts-against-yards-net
concept.definition: Number of net yards - punt length minus return - of opposing team's punts.

concept.name: punts-against-longest
concept.definition: Longest punt by opposing team.

concept.name: punts-against-inside-20
concept.definition: Punt returns failed to advance beyond team's own 20.

concept.name: punts-against-inside-20-percentage
concept.definition: Ratio of punt returns failed to advance beyond team's own 20 and total punt returns.

concept.name: punts-against-average
concept.definition: Average length of opponent's punt.

concept.name: punts-against-average-net
concept.definition: Average net length - punt length minus return - of opponent's punt..

concept.name: punts-blocked
concept.definition: The number of punts that were blocked.

concept.name: punts-against-blocked
concept.definition: The number of punts made by the opposing team that this team or player has blocked.

concept.name: touchbacks-total
concept.definition: The total number of touchbacks, from kickoffs, punts, interceptions, and fumbles.

concept.name: touchbacks-total-percentage
concept.definition: The percentage of kickoffs, punts, interceptions, and fumbles which resulted in a touchback.

concept.name: touchbacks-kickoffs
concept.definition: The number of kickoffs that went into the end zone and were not brought out.

concept.name: touchbacks-kickoffs-percentage
concept.definition: The percentage of kickoffs resulting in touchbacks.

concept.name: touchbacks-punts
concept.definition: The number of punts that went into the end zone and were not brought out.

concept.name: touchbacks-punts-percentage
concept.definition: The percentage of punts resulting in touchbacks.

concept.name: touchbacks-interceptions
concept.definition: The number of interceptions that went into the end zone and were not brought out.

concept.name: touchbacks-interceptions-percentage
concept.definition: The percentage of interceptions resulting in touchbacks.

concept.name: touchbacks-punts-against
concept.definition: Number of punts not returned out of receiving team's end zone.

concept.name: fair-catches
concept.definition: The number of fair catches.

concept.name: fair-catches-against
concept.definition: Number of fair catches by opponents.

concept.name: total-return-yardage-not-kickoffs
concept.definition: Net return yardage excluding kickoff returns.

concept.name: touchdowns-against
concept.definition: Total number of special teams touchdowns allowed.

concept.name: tackles-special-teams
concept.definition: The number of tackles made while playing for a special-team.

concept.name: tackles-special-teams-assists
concept.definition: The number of tackle assists performed while on special-teams.

concept.name: extra-points-against-made
concept.definition: Number of extra point attempts made by the opposing team that were successful.

concept.name: extra-points-against-missed
concept.definition: Number of extra point attempts made by the opposing team that were not successful.

concept.name: extra-points-against-blocked
concept.definition: Number of extra point attempts made by the opposing team that were blocked by this team or player.

concept.name: field-goals-against-made
concept.definition: Number of field goal attempts made by the opposing team that were successful.

concept.name: field-goals-against-missed
concept.definition: Number of field goal attempts made by the opposing team that were not successful.

concept.name: field-goals-against-blocked
concept.definition: Number of field goal attempts made by the opposing team that were blocked by this player or team.

concept.name: fumbles-committed
concept.definition: The total number of fumbles.

concept.name: fumbles-forced
concept.definition: The number of fumbles that were forced by the opposing team.

concept.name: fumbles-recovered
concept.definition: The number of fumbles that were recovered by the fumbling team.

concept.name: fumbles-lost
concept.definition: The number of fumbles that were not recovered by the fumbling team.

concept.name: fumbles-lost-average-per-game
concept.definition: Average number of fumbles lost per game.

concept.name: fumbles-yards-gained
concept.definition: The number of yards gained as a result of fumbles.

concept.name: fumbles-own-committed
concept.definition: The number of fumbles committed by this team.

concept.name: fumbles-own-recovered
concept.definition: The number of fumbles committed by this team that were then also recovered by this team.

concept.name: fumbles-own-lost
concept.definition: The number of fumbles committed by this team but recovered by the other team. A subset of turnovers. Also referred to as a giveaway.

concept.name: fumbles-own-yards-gained
concept.definition: The number of yards gained as a result of fumbles by this team.

concept.name: fumbles-own-touchdowns
concept.definition: The number of touchdowns earned after a team recovers its own fumbles.

concept.name: fumbles-opposing-committed
concept.definition: The number of fumbles committed by the opposing team.

concept.name: fumbles-opposing-recovered
concept.definition: The number of fumbles committed by the opposing but recovered by this team. A subset of turnovers. Also referred to a takeaway.

concept.name: fumbles-opposing-recovered-average-per-game
concept.definition: Average number of opposing team's fumbles recovered per game.

concept.name: fumbles-opposing-lost
concept.definition: The number of fumbles committed by the opposing team that were subsequently lost to the opposing team.

concept.name: fumbles-opposing-yards-gained
concept.definition: The number of yards gained as a result of fumbles by the opposing team.

concept.name: fumbles-opposing-touchdowns
concept.definition: The number of touchdowns scored as a result of fumbles by the opposing team..

concept.name: fumbles-committed-defense
concept.definition: The number of fumbles committed by a player or team on defense.

concept.name: fumbles-lost-defense
concept.definition: The number of fumbles lost by a player or team on defense.

concept.name: fumbles-forced-defense
concept.definition: The number of fumbles forced by a player or team on defense.

concept.name: fumbles-recovered-defense
concept.definition: The number of fumbles recovered by a player or team on defense.

concept.name: fumbles-recovered-yards-defense
concept.definition: The number of yards gained on fumbles recovered by a player or team on defense.

concept.name: fumbles-committed-special-teams
concept.definition: The number of fumbles committed by a player or team on special-teams.

concept.name: fumbles-lost-special-teams
concept.definition: The number of fumbles lost by a player or team on special-teams.

concept.name: fumbles-forced-special-teams
concept.definition: The number of fumbles forced by a player or team on special-teams.

concept.name: fumbles-recovered-special-teams
concept.definition: The number of fumbles recovered by a player or team on special-teams.

concept.name: fumbles-recovered-yards-special-teams
concept.definition: The number of yards gained on fumbles recovered by a player or team on special-teams.

concept.name: fumbles-committed-other
concept.definition: The number of fumbles committed by a player or team on neither defense or special teams.

concept.name: fumbles-lost-other
concept.definition: The number of fumbles lost by a player or team on neither defense or special teams.

concept.name: fumbles-forced-other
concept.definition: The number of fumbles forced by a player or team on neither defense or special teams.

concept.name: fumbles-recovered-other
concept.definition: The number of fumbles recovered by a player or team on neither defense or special teams.

concept.name: fumbles-recovered-yards-other
concept.definition: The number of yards gained on fumbles recovered by a player or team on neither defense or special teams.

concept.name: touchbacks-fumbles
concept.definition: The number of fumbles into the end zone that are not brought out.

concept.name: touchbacks-fumbles-percentage
concept.definition: The percentage of fumbles that resulted in touchbacks.

concept.name: penalties-total
concept.definition: The number of penalties.

concept.name: penalty-yards
concept.definition: The yards gained as a result of penalties.

concept.name: penalty-first-downs
concept.definition: The number of first downs gained as a result of penalties.

concept.name: penalty-opponent-yards
concept.definition: Yards opponents gain as a result of penalties.

concept.name: penalties-opponent-total
concept.definition: Total of penalties by opposing team.

concept.name: penalties-challenged
concept.definition: Includes penalty challenges that were both won and lost.

concept.name: penalties-reviewed
concept.definition: Includes both coach challenges and booth challenges (by the replay assistant in the NFL).

concept.name: penalties-overturned
concept.definition: The number of successful penalty challenges by a team, leading to the overturning of the original call.

schemeMeta.definition: Vocabulary of statistics for American Football
schemeMeta.name: American Football Statistics
